title: NaturalPersonRoleEnum
description: The enumerated values for the natural person's role.

oneOf.title: Broker
oneOf.description: The person who arranged with a client to execute the trade.

oneOf.title: Buyer
oneOf.description: Acquirer of the legal title to the financial instrument.

oneOf.title: DecisionMaker
oneOf.description: The party or person with legal responsibility for authorization of the execution of the transaction.

oneOf.title: ExecutionWithinFirm
oneOf.description: Person within the firm who is responsible for execution of the transaction.

oneOf.title: InvestmentDecisionMaker
oneOf.description: Person who is responsible for making the investment decision.

oneOf.title: Seller
oneOf.description: Seller of the legal title to the financial instrument.

oneOf.title: Trader
oneOf.description: The person who executed the trade.
